name: Sakan Do'nair
content: Sakan Do'nair was a Kel Dor male Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Master Do'nair along with a battalion of Jedi Knights were assigned to aid in the protection of the ancient Rakatan Foundry in the Nanth'ri system under the command of the Prodigal Knight Revan during the latter half of the Cold War. While in transit to the Foundry aboard the Dorin's Sky, the ship came under attack by an Imperial attack force led by the White Nova under the command of Moff Phenir on orders from Darth Malgus. Master Do'nair lead several Jedi against the vanguard of the boarding party, but perished in battle.
